channel.title: Local area connection
channel.description: Right, I am planning on playing a private server with my sister, I just tried it on another laptop connecting them with a network cable and would'nt work. I really need help with this. I think it has something to do with the ip.

item.title: Local area connection
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“BubbleScape x, post:11, topic:354786”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=451353.msg3308278#msg3308278 date=1281817502]

[quote author=BubbleScape x link=topic=451353.msg3308277#msg3308277 date=1281817426]

[quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=451353.msg3308275#msg3308275 date=1281817378]

Only the hoster will connect via localhost.

Other connections include:

Same network: IPv4 address.
Outside connections: Your actual IP address.
[/quote]The same house, read.

What are you on about? Vain is right…
[/quote]Yes he is, But he is the same house.

Same house, same network. I’m not sure what you’re getting at.
[/quote]THE SAME GODAMN FUCKING IP, AS THE HOSTING COMPUTER, AND THE FUCKING LAPTOP. THE SAME IP! THEREFORE THE LAPTOP CAN CONNECT LOCALHOST…stop being a fucking dumbfuck.[/quote]
Localhost cannot be used to connect to a different computer. As Vain said, if they are on the same network(Same IP address) the host connects with localhost, and anyone else would use the host computers IPv4 address. Localhost is your own computer.

Read full topic

[/quote]

It did’nt work…
When I plugged the network cable in it comes up with “Limited or no connectivity”
Help…[/quote]This isn’t even a moparscape related question… The connection to your internet totally, has nothing to do with runescape, or moparscape…
